p: In our study, T. lucida essential oil produced a significant and dose-dependent pharmacological antinociceptive response in the nociceptive experimental pain model. The most abundant constituents found in this species were geranyl acetate, followed by the presence of geraniol and β-caryophyllene; minor abundance was found for (−)-β-cubebene, ( E)-β-ocimene, γ-elemene, linalool, and β-pinene, as well as traces of others.
